WorkItem.Description:
Just installed silverlight and should have the latest version from Microsoft.  When trying to open Rawr from either Firefox or IE8 the loading percentage gets to 100% and stays there.
 
Additionally, when using IE8 I get the following script error (when clicking on the ! to get more details)
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Webpage error details
 
User Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; InfoPath.3; .NET4.0C)
Timestamp: Wed, 27 Oct 2010 17:55:56 UTC
 
 
Message: Unhandled Error in Rawr 
Code: 2007    
Category: ParserError       
Message: 2007 An error has occurred.     
File:      
Line: 8     
Position: 45     
 
Line: 35
Char: 13
Code: 0
URI: http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php
 
 
Message: 'COMSCORE' is undefined
Line: 588
Char: 1
Code: 0
URI: http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Stuck at 100%, Script error on page

Comments.Message:
This doesn't really matter as the current Rawr3 will be going away when we post a Rawr4. If the issue persists after that point ok.

Rawr2 & 3 are already out of date because they are based on WotLK 3.x calcs instead of 4.x calcs.

Understandable, I suppose I should have reviewed the discussion pages before posting the error log as I was unaware of the current state of things - it's been quite a while since I've used Rawr.  Thanks for the reply as well as the work you guys have put into the project.
